item.description:
ADVANCED GOLF with LEGENDARY GOLF CHAMPION MIKE COLANDRO

FOR EXPERIENCED GOLFERS ONLY

ADVANCED GOLF with Legendary Golf Champion gives you a once in a lifetime opportunity to play Golf with and learn from Golf Champion Mike Colandro- and benefit from his years of experience to help you improve your Golfing knowledge and skills.

ADVANCED GOLF starts out Tuesday at the Driving Range with Short Irons' Fairway Woods and Drivers for an unique Golf Lesson that with help you to play better Golf.

Thursday is used as a rain date in case of any bad weather.

SUNDAY starts out with Putting and Chipping to make you a great Golfer, then Mike takes you on the golf course to give you personalized Playing Lessons out on this beautiful 9 hole Golf Course located in Windsor CT Connecticut

Join Mike Colandro after the Playing Lessons for more Golf Tips, Golf Stories, PRIZES from Titleist, and a great time!

NOTE- Class Size Is Limited To 6 People And Will Fill Up Quickly -Reserve Your Spot Today

ADVANCED GOLF with Legendary Golf Champion gives you a once in a lifetime opportunity to play Golf with and learn from Golf Champion Mike Colandro- and benefit from his years of experience to help you improve your Golfing knowledge and skills.

ADVANCED GOLF with Golf Lessons from Legendary Golf Champion Mike Colandro

-Play Golf with Mike Colandro while he teaches you the skills that he used to win Championships in Australia and New Zealand. ADVANCED GOLF with Mike Colandro is a very unique opportunity to learn from and play
Golf with a Golf Legend!

Your 6 hours of Golf Lessons include Driving RangeÂ -Short Irons, Fairway Woods and Drivers, Putting and Chipping, and 9 holes of Playing Lessons out on the Golf Course. Class size is 6 people - that guarantees you personal attention.

Join Mike after the Playing Lessons for an after party to ask questions and talk Golf - Plus PRIZES from Titleist


4 Hours of Hands-On lessons with Golf Champion Mike Colandro pus AFTERPARTY is only $100

SPACE IS LIMITED TO 6 PEOPLE - RESERVE YOU SPOT TODAY

Visit http://www.AdvancedGo... or call (860) 436-9449 for info
